entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 08:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning then changing to rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
